name: Burger Brawl (itch) (Le Regiment, François Goret)
description:
Burger Brawl is a Rogue-lite, Arcade and cartoon style. You control a Hero Burger who has to defeat the bad recipes from TokTok. 

Controls:

  • Z,Q,S,D : Move your characcter
  • Use your mouse to look around
  • Left click Mouse :Shoot
  • E : interact
